nodes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the provided address or sender
account.
nodes.name: Owned

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation: @dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
nodes.name: transferOwnership
